chi_square_test.test: Chi-square test of independence (size class × species)
chi_square_test.interpretation: Plasmid size distribution is significantly non-random across species

kruskal_wallis_test.test: Kruskal-Wallis H test (plasmid size across species)
kruskal_wallis_test.interpretation: Plasmid sizes differ significantly across species

mann_whitney_test.test: Mann-Whitney U test (K. pneumoniae vs other species)
mann_whitney_test.interpretation: K. pneumoniae plasmids differ significantly in size from other species

enrichment_test.test: Binomial test (70-160 kb class enrichment vs 20% expected)
enrichment_test.interpretation: The 70-160 kb size class is significantly enriched (80.4% vs 20% expected)
